text: Amadera kache tomara lohara tukarogulo niye esa.’’ Atahpara yakhana du'i paharera madhyabarti jayaga tini purna karalena takhana balalena -- ''hapare dama dite thaka.’’ Tarapara yakhana ta aguna baniye tulalo takhana tini balalena -- ''amara kache galita tama niye esa ami era upare dhele deba.
